context: Hello! What kind of movies are you into?
hi I love awful 80s movies. Something like One Crazy Summer (1986) or Better Off Dead (1985) Any good recomendations?
Oh, yes...Love both of those. How about something like Porky's (1981)? My husband and I re-watched Police Academy (1984) recently. It really is a hoot and makes for a fun nostalgic trip.
Oh yes, I love Porky's (1981) Omg, I am definitely going to rewatch Police Academy (1984)
resp: Of course, Sixteen Candles (1984) is silly and campy. Love Molly Ringwald.
